changeSet.author: pmo
changeSet.comment: Change default value of is delete in user

changeSet.author: pmo
changeSet.sql:
CREATE PROCEDURE insert_role_plan_screen_actions_by_role_plan_actions ( IN roleName VARCHAR(50), IN planId VARCHAR(36), IN actionNameList TEXT)
BEGIN INSERT INTO `role_plan_screen_action` (`role_plan_screen_id`, `action_id`)
with t as ( SELECT rps.id as 'role_plan_screen_id', r.name as 'role_name', s.name as 'screen_name' from role_plan_screen rps inner join role r on r.id = rps.role_id inner join screen s on s.id = rps.screen_id where r.name = roleName -- and s.url = 'admin/' and plan_id = planId )
select t.role_plan_screen_id, A.id from t, action as A where FIND_IN_SET(A.name, actionNameList); END
